alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON... NORTHWESTERN MADISON...SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS AND SOUTHWESTERN BROOKS COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Monticello, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Greenville, Alma, Dills, Grooverville, Lamont, Aucilla, Lois, Everett, Nash, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Jarrott, Montivilla, and Ashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
